name: SimpleRockets
description: I am excited to release my first game on Steam! SimpleRockets was released in 2013 for mobile and I've put a ton of work into it to get it ready for PC and Mac. It was inspired by KSP, and it offers a simpler 2D experience for building rockets and exploring space with realistic orbital mechanics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: SM2 128MB VRAM Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Kerbal space program in a single plane. It's still rocket science, but everything is a lot easier when you only have x-y. I would strongly recommend this over KSP for kids. And if you enjoy KSP, this is a good companion - it has more of an arcadey fun feel to KSP's realism.
Needs more parts and things to do in sandbox, more rockets, satelites,lunar landers, types of rockets, cockpits, deployments,
very good game could use more parts though

Solid.  Great  little game for casual rocketeers like me: though I own and admire Kerbal Space Program, I find it a little daunting. In addition, SimpleRockets is tiny, and it loads and plays like greased lightning even on my potato of a rig.  Verdict: two rockets up (oh myyyy)!
This is a great game to learn basic rocket science and it's super fun! Also, I love the homage to Kerbal Space Program.
Great game I have to say!
Great game for a couple of shillings.  10/10 would build a unstable craft and miss the target again
Awesome Game. Very Cool. I love all the Satellite items that made the game much more flexible.
Oh yes.
it won't open on a windows ten i've done everthing i could find but i still wouldn't open
It didn't work, like I pressed play and nothing would happen!
This can be a good game but only for a while. If you want a good space rocket game, get Kerbal Space Program.
I have spent more time than is healthy playing this game, an amazing time waster.

Its a very easy game, its incredibly simple to get from the smeath to the smoon, and getting to other planets would only require slightly more planing and more fuel/thrust. The controls, maps, and building are all a bit awkward, and dont act exactly how they should. Its really just an IOS game, and it would be kind of fun to play on the bus on your phone.  That being said this game has potential, its not a bad game in anyway. I really only see it as being worth $3-5 for whats in it current, and what you get compared to KSP.
Great fun and very helpful to get the kiddies started down the road into programming in a fun way.
i need help ive done everything steam has told me and youtube and google have told me but it keeps saying its running but now allowing me to play the game
Great game, but cant find simplemodder or even the folders necessary for modding! :(

okay so this game is good, i LOVE it. but it seems to be missing a ceirtan something, everyone here knows just doesnt want to say so i will. it has great gameplay, simple (obviosly), and gives great dynamics and such! but it limits a LOT, there are so little parts to play with! at first its fine, but after playing for two days or so its SOOO boring and too simple! you honestly dont have to change anything, just add more parts that do more things! add power and life support to keep people alive! dont make it like KSP just add a little more, KSP is too hard but this is too simple! we need a bit more to work with and play! but all in all it is a GREAT game and i LOVE it, i just wish they would put in a little more.
I can't wait for simple rockets 2. It is one of my most hyped games and we have no info other than it is WILL be a thing. says a lot!
very simple, the tutorials describe what to do perfectly
A Great 2D game, its fun, and it will run on a potato, go ahead, what are you waiting for? buy it!
